sentence.Network_en: A photographer recorded the scene on video for posterity.
sentence.Network_cn: 摄影师用摄像机为后代记录下了这个场景。

sentence.Network_en: Their music has been preserved for posterity .
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的音乐已为后世保存起来。

sentence.Network_en: Few of his works will go down to posterity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的作品没有几件会流传到后世.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 后字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 后此〖 afterwards;henceforth〗 后代〖 posterity;offspring〗 子孙后代〖 laterages〗.
词根及词缀 ... posterior a 以后的 posterity n 后代，子孙 preposterous a 荒谬的，不合理的.
后字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 后遗症〖 sequelae〗 后裔〖 descendant;posterity;offspring〗 后羿〖 Houyi〗.
子字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 子孙饽饽〖 smalldumplingsasfoodforthebrideandgroom〗 子孙后代〖 posterity〗 子群〖 subgroup〗.

list.abs: 博文_～桃桃～_新浪博客 ... 路上风景·杭州-千岛湖 On the way… 电影海报二零零九 Movie Posters… [济州]城山日出峰（下） Sunris…
周边产品包含手表显示器、医疗感测仪器、智慧型海报(smart posters)，以及家庭娱乐系统等。物联网将带动各类新应用程式与服务的 …
水粉（Poster color） 又称广告色，是不透明水彩颜料。可用于较厚的着色，大面积上色时也不会出现不均匀的现象。
第83届奥斯卡金像奖_百度百科 ... 《它的名字叫杀戮》 Killing in the Name 《海报女郎（poster girl）》 Poster Girl 《旭日东升》 Sun Come Up.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French posterite, from Latin posteritas, from posterus 'following'

entry.def: You can refer to everyone who will be alive in the future as posterity .

example.ex: A photographer recorded the scene on video for posterity...
example.tran: 摄影师用摄像机为后代记录下了这个场景。

example.ex: Was he making these notes for the benefit of posterity?
example.tran: 他写下这些笔记是为让后人受益吗？

means.word_mean: 1. all of the offspring of a given progenitor;

sentences.sentence: "we must secure the benefits of freedom for ourselves and our posterity"

auth_sentence.content: He was writing a history of humanity for posterity.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was writing a history of humanity for posterity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was writing a history of humanity for posterity.

auth_sentence.content: The diaries were written to be read by posterity.
auth_sentence.res_content: The diaries were written to be read by posterity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The diaries were written to be read by posterity.

auth_sentence.content: Posterity has not been kind to Bobby Darin.
auth_sentence.res_content: Posterity has not been kind to Bobby Darin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Posterity has not been kind to Bobby Darin.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"邮件,邮政"; 2. 表示"在后面"

stems_affixes.word_buile: post邮件,邮政+al……的→adj.邮政的
post在后面+er+ior……的→后面的
post在后面+graduate毕业→n.研究所学生,研究生 adj.大学毕业后的
post在后面+hum土+ous……的→入土表示死→死后的
post在后面+war战争→adj.战后的
post邮件,邮政→n.邮件,邮政 v. 邮递
post邮件,邮政+age费用→n.邮资
post邮件,邮政+card纸片→n.明信片
post邮件,邮政+er表示东西→n.招贴画,驿站
post邮件,邮政+man人→n.邮差
post邮件,邮政+mark记号→n.邮戳
post邮件,邮政+office办公室→n.邮局
post在后面+date日期→v. 填迟……的日期 n. 事后日期
post在后面+er+ity表名词→后面的人→子孙
post在后面+face脸;前面→后面的脸→刊后语
post在后面+graduate毕业→n.研究所学生,研究生 adj.大学毕业后的
post在后面+script写→写在后面的话
post邮件,邮政→n.邮件,邮政 v. 邮递
post在后面+date日期→v. 填迟……的日期 n. 事后日期
post在后面+pone放→放到后面→推迟
poster后面+ior较……的→后面的
pre前面+poster后面+ous表形容词→前后倒置的→荒谬的
poster后面+ity表名词→后面的人→子孙

sentences.en: Few of his works will go down to posterity.
sentences.cn: 他的作品没有几件会流传到后世。

sentences.en: The names of those who died are recorded for posterity on a tablet at the back of the church.
sentences.cn: 死者姓名都刻在教堂后面的一块石匾上以便后人铭记。
